message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled features and capabilities, setting new standards in its field. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and innovation, we are offering it to you for a special introductory price of $750000. Please let us know if this aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and innovation of your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $600000 for this purchase. I hope we can come to an agreement that suits both of us.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to consider a compromise. While our initial offer was at $750000, I am now proposing a revised price of $650000. This still reflects the high value and quality of the product while accommodating your budget. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for. Please let me know your thoughts or if you'd like to discuss further details.
